model

Class AbstractMoveableGameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.AbstractGameObject
      • model.AbstractMovableGameObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGameObject, IMovable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bird, Car

    public abstract class AbstractMoveableGameObject
extends AbstractGameObject
implements IMovable
    Abstraction for all game objects which can be moved.
    Author:
    Robert Wilk

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static int BASE_ANGLE
      A heading value which equates to "straight" ahead.
      protected static double DEGREE_CONVERTER 
      private int heading
      The heading of the game object.
      private int speed
      The speed of the game object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractMoveableGameObject(java.awt.Color color, Location2D location, int speed, int heading)
      In addition to the data taken by the super AbstractGameObject.AbstractGameObject(Color, Location2D) class, this constructor takes the speed and heading of the movable object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      int getSpeed()

      Provides the default move behavior of movable game objects.
      protected void setHeading(int heading) 
      protected void setSpeed(int speed) 
      void update()
      Ensures the move method of this class is called when movable objects are updated.

        Parameters:
        speed - The initial speed of the object.
        heading - The initial heading of the object.
